newsitem.title: USA: Eagle Point sees weaker fiscal Q2 shr.
newsitem.headline: Eagle Point sees weaker fiscal Q2 shr.

text.p: Eagle Point Software Corp said Tuesday it foresaw its revenues and earnings for the second quarter ending December 31 to be below industry estimates.
It also said it expected "a small loss from operations" in the period.
Industry earnings estimates for the second quarter were $0.03 per share, it added.

"Our expected results for this quarter reflect a continuation of the same market conditions that we've previously reported," it said, referring to market softness for it products and delays in customer purchases of its software.
Founded in 1983, Eagle Point is a supplier of AEC application software.
